about.description: I'm a graduate student studying Computer Science at UVA with a passion for blockchain, full-stack development, and forensics. I have experience in software development, blockchain research, and cloud technologies.

certifications: CCNAv7: Switching, Routing and Wireless Essentials

projects.name: Face Mask Detection & Attendance System
projects.description: Created an algorithm using OpenCV to detect face masks and integrate it into an attendance system using live feed.

description: Designed and implemented scalable Cryptocurrency Forensics and Disk Forensics software.
Designed APIs using C++ and Python backend and Operating System services to increase performance of software.
Managed the team as Lead, optimizing workflows using Git and other tools and communicating design architectures.
Deployed solutions in multiple architectures on AWS Cloud and on Linux Servers using Network Design & Containers.
experience.tech_stack: NextJS, C++, Python, Git, Operating Systems, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency Forensics, Disk Forensics

description: Gained expertise in cryptocurrency forensics using OSINT techniques.
